::: {.callout-caution collapse="true"}
## Pogacar rules

If Tadej scores points in any way, they are halved. This is the only way to make his inclusion in our comp fair. He's that good. Note that this doesn't affect the points of his domestiques e.g. if he wins a stage they still get 3 points.

:::

::: {.callout-note collapse="true"}
## Stage

1st = 10

2nd = 6

3rd = 4

4th = 2

5th = 1

:::

::: {.callout-note collapse="true"}
## A day in the jersey

This only conveys once. Wearers for multiple days do not receive additional points.

Yellow = 10

Green = 5

Polka dots = 5

White = 5
:::

::: {.callout-note collapse="true"}
## A day in the breakaway

Making it into the break = 5

PCS classifies this as spending greater than 50% of a stage in front of the main peloton.
:::

::: {.callout-note collapse="true"}

## Domestique

Team stage 2nd = 2

Team stage 3rd = 1

Team GC win = 8

Team GC 2nd = 6

Team GC 3rd = 4
:::
